attributes.action: MI5 Officers reporting of latest status of Singapore evil Mr. Hwa Chi Lin, which is one of the foreign diplomacy of Gordon Brown in year 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,

** This regard Mr. Gordon Brown foreign diplomacy onto Singapore evil Mr. Hwa Chi Lin **

We lost the proper way of reporting due to frontline XX ?? !! situations.

We are the Malaysia & MI5 "Green Tree Leaf" Angel officers need to report to Mr. Gordon Brown about Singapore Hwa Chi Lin, whom Mr. Gordon Brown declare enemy in year 2009.

This Singapore Hwa Chi Lin had 2 version of him. First is termed as evil (proud) version of him capable of murder of Dr. Tony Tan.
2nd Version of Singapore Hwa Chi Lin is termed as righteous (humble) version of him, which we take that as a cover.

We need to report this to Mr. Gordon Brown or "Green Tree Leaf", "Fireball in center forehead", "Golden Light", "Sunlight" Angel officers in MI5.

In which upon approval, MI5 would informed Mr. Lee Kuan Yew (Senior Minister in Singapore)of Singapore Parliament who are in close watch of Singapore Hwa Chi Lin.
In Jun 2009, Mr. Lee Kuan Yew despatch Golden Light Angel Officers to monitor Singapore Hwa Chi Lin. We noticed that again in Oct 2009, that the Golden Light Angel Officers "pay attention visit" onto Hwa Chi Lin.

 

Regards


Angel Officers

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
